root.name: BS Zelda no Densetsu
root.description: OverviewBS Zelda no Densetsu was an updated version of the NES classic title The Legend of Zelda that was released on the Satellaview platform in 1995. As the Satellaview was never made available outside of Japan, BS Zelda no Densetsu remains a Japan-only release. It was made available to download in four weekly instalments.The game does not feature the character Link, it instead allowed the player to take control of a male or a female character, which could be configured by the player inputting their own name and gender into the game selection interface of the the Satellaview.
